Reviews.Title: Every 3d TV owner needs one!
Reviews.Author: Stoney Turner
Reviews.Content: This thing has been great, even the video is good.  The packaged software however, is lame.  Will use another video editor that can handle 3d video.  We've found that whatever is approx. 10ft from the camera is even with the TV screen in depth, anything closer then appears to stick out from the screen, anything further away appears 10ft or more back into the next room, amazing.

Reviews.Title: Just my opinion
Reviews.Author: OblivionDragon
Reviews.Content: I like 3D, even have a 3D phone so I wanted 3D materials ,without taking two individual shots, to put on it to show it off.I'd only  recommend it to  3D enthusiast.I would have liked it more if there was an option for Side-by-side photo save(Discontinued product)3D is a dying market more or less. It one of those things that gets popular fast and dies to almost nothing but a few movies for a few decades .
